description: Louie Barry scores his 16th goal of the season for Stockport County but they are held to a 1-1 draw at Rotherham United.
title: Rotherham United 1-1 Stockport County
title_page: Rotherham United 1-1 Stockport County: Barry on target again for visitors - BBC Sport
maintext:
Rotherham United have lost just one of their last seven league games against Stockport County (W3 D3), scoring exactly two goals on average across that time.
Each of Stockport County’s last 11 away league games against Rotherham United have been won by either side, with the Hatters taking five victories across that time – the latest coming in a 4-1 success in February 2008.
Rotherham have won just two of their last 11 final league games of the year (D2 L7), failing to win any of their last four such matches since a 4-0 win over Peterborough United in 2019.
Stockport are unbeaten across their last four final Football League games of the year that have come away from home (W3 D1), drawing 0-0 with Bradford City in their last such fixture in 2023.
